name: rsms-mkweb
description: Build simple static websites authored in Markdown

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && esbuild --minify --bundle mkweb.js --platform=node --target=node14 --outfile=dist/mkweb --sourcemap=inline --sources-content=false --external:autoprefixer --external:cssnano && chmod +x dist/mkweb
scripts.build-dev: mkdir -p dist && touch dist/mkweb-dev && chmod +x dist/mkweb-dev && esbuild --watch --bundle mkweb.js --platform=node --target=node14 --outfile=dist/mkweb-dev --sourcemap=inline --sources-content=false --external:autoprefixer --external:cssnano

author: Rasmus Andersson <rsms.me>
